H0.text: On which instrument would a ‘paradiddle’ be played. Xylophone

H1.text: On which instrument would a ‘paradiddle’ be played. Harp

H2.text: On which instrument would a ‘paradiddle’ be played. Castanets

H3.text: On which instrument would a ‘paradiddle’ be played. Drums

A4.text: A paradiddle is used in drumming music.
